outputs.output_descr: The aim of this project is to support the activities of the State Committee for Family, Women and Children's Affairs (SCFWCA) through expanding women’s participation in the economic and community life, with a focus on rural areas
Establishment of the Gender Study and Research Center in the Azerbaijan Pedagogical University

project_descr: Promoting rural women participation in the economic and social life
project_title: Rural women participation in economic and social life
